[v2] stop # FIXME

chezmoi unmanaged
stdout .bashrc
stdout .inputrc

chezmoi add $HOME${/}.bashrc
chezmoi unmanaged
! stdout .bashrc
stdout .inputrc

chezmoi add $HOME${/}.inputrc
chezmoi unmanaged
! stdout .bashrc
! stdout .inputrc

chezmoi forget $HOME${/}.bashrc
chezmoi unmanaged
stdout .bashrc
! stdout .inputrc

chezmoi forget $HOME${/}.inputrc
! stdout .bashrc
! stdout .inputrc

-- home/user/.bashrc --
# contents of .bashrc
-- home/user/.inputrc --
# contents of .inputrc
